explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses support vector machines (SVMs) as powerful tools for problem solution in machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: SVMs are primarily used in supervised learning settings, as indicated by the discussion of standard problems like classification.
explanations.semi-supervised learning: The paper mentions semi-supervised SVM as one of the models discussed for nonstandard problems.
explanations.classification: SVMs are widely used for classification tasks, which is a major focus of the paper.
explanations.support vector machine: The entire paper is focused on support vector machines (SVMs) and their various models and applications.
explanations.SVM: SVM is the main topic of the paper, with various SVM models and applications discussed.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses l(p)-norm SVM for feature selection, which is related to feature learning.
